SEARCH
Package com.paymybuddy.appli.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.paymybuddy.appli.controller.UserController
@Controller public class UserController extends Object
Controller class for managing user-related actions. This controller provides endpoints for user registration, login, profile management, relation management, and logout functionalities.

    • getRegister

      @GetMapping("/register") public String getRegister(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the registration page.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the registration view template ("register.html").

    • postRegister

      @PostMapping("/register") public String postRegister(@ModelAttribute DBUser user, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Processes the registration of a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user details submitted via the registration form.
      model - The model used to pass attributes to the view in case of an error.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the login page if registration is successful, or the registration page if an error occurs.

    • getLogin

      Displays the login page.
      Parameters:
      model - The model used to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the login view template ("login.html").

    • postLogin

      @PostMapping("/login") public String postLogin()
      Handles the login process.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the profile page upon successful login.

    • getProfil

      @GetMapping("/profil") public String getProfil(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the profile page for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details.
      model - The model used to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the profile view template ("profil.html").

    • updateProfile

      @PostMapping("/profil") public String updateProfile(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @ModelAttribute DBUser user, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Updates the profile of the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details.
      user - The updated profile information.
      redirectAttributes - The redirect attributes used to pass attributes to the view.
      Returns:
      The profile page with updated details.

    • getRelation

      Displays the relation management page.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • postRelation

      @PostMapping("/relation") public DBUser postRelation(@AuthenticationPrincipal org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UserDetails userDetails, @RequestParam String email, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Adds a new relation for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - The authenticated user's details.
      email - The email of the user to establish a relation with.
      Returns:
      The newly created relation.

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Logs out the currently authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      request - The HTTP request.
      response - The HTTP response.
      Returns:
      A redirect to the login page after logout.
